modName: Oriental Face save slot for enhanced character edit
summary:
this is my character slot preset.
requaired enhanced character edit.
descriptionHtml:
This is a character slot file for ECE. NOT a save file.

Installation guide :
1. Do not use NMM for installation.
2. Download and install requirement mods.
3. Download this slot file and extract.
4. Copy the slot file and paste to my document/my games/skyrim/CME_save/
5. Start the game and go to character creation menu (by using "showracemenu command or face sculptor in riften).
6. Load slot number. slot number 5 (original setting with sg hair 268 edition). slot number 4 (same as slot number 5, but use vanila hair).

Unistallation guide :
1. delete the slot file.
2. or overwrite the slot file with new settings.

Requirement mods :
1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanched Character Edit[/url]

Recommend mod (if you want the end result same as my screenshot) :
1. Body texture : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52287/?]Asian Doll Face[/url](Asian Doll Face no longer avaliable in nexus. may be you can find in another web sites). install fair skin first then asian dollface. select "yes to all" so asian dollface can overwrite some files from fair skin and headmesh from ECE.

2. Brow : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]sg female eyebrows[/url]

3. Body mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] or UNP varian (like 7B,UNPB, and so on).

4. Hair mod : Sg hair 268 edition or any hair mod you like.

5. Eye texture mod : this preset use vanila eye, so you can choose any eye texture mod you like.
author: nafis399
